name: Bone Helm [1]
description: Hard headwear made of bones. Although it's heavy and difficult to wear, it has great Def.

name: Bone in Mouth
description: Very fragrant bones. If you want a dog to be quiet, You can try to throw this bone to it.

name: Bongun Hat
description: Hat worn by the monster Bongun. The point is part of the upper half is a half-split spell, which doesn't block the sight much.

name: Boots of Judgment
description: In order to hunt down devils, the judgment must go to many places, sometimes even the alien world, so these boots are with special magic blessings
effect: Move Spd ＋8%,＋50% [Adoramus] multiplier upon reaching refining ＋10; ＋100% [Adoramus] multiplier upon reaching refining ＋15

name: Bottle Grenade
description: Dangerous alloy. If you throw it after ignition, You will cause a sea of flame.

name: Bowknot Glaze
description: Transparent bowknot that emits pale blue light, it is inspired by the Glaze butterflies resting on the Yggdrasil, after putting it on you will get a lightened feel.
effect: M.Dmg Reduc. ＋ 8%,For every 1 percent of M.Dmg Reduc., gain extra 75 Max HP.
